sqlQuery.name: OrganismAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, project_id, source_id as old_source_id, project_id AS old_project_id FROM ApidbTuning.OrganismAttributes

sqlQuery.name: organismAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, project_id, oa.species, replace(replace(oa.species, '[', ''), ']', '') as species_display, oa.strain, CASE oa.is_reference_strain WHEN 0 THEN 'no' WHEN 1 THEN 'yes' END as is_reference_strain, oa.orthomcl_abbrev, oa.name_for_filenames, 'Data files' as download_link, organism_name, organism_name AS organism_full, oa.megabps, nullif(oa.ncbi_tax_id, 0) as ncbi_tax_id, nullif(oa.species_ncbi_tax_id, 0) as species_ncbi_tax_id, database_version, --oa.strain_abbrev as strain, oa.contigCount, oa.supercontigCount, oa.chromosomeCount, nullif(oa.genecount, 0) as genecount, oa.genecount as genecount_number, oa.pseudogenecount, oa.codinggenecount, oa.othergenecount, nullif(oa.arraygenecount,0) as arraygenecount, nullif(oa.ecnumbercount,0) as ecnumbercount, --nullif(oa.popsetcount,0) as popsetcount, nullif(oa.rnaseqcount,0) as rnaseqcount, --nullif(oa.snpcount, 0) as snpcount, nullif(oa.chipchipgenecount,0) as chipchipgenecount, nullif(oa.rtpcrcount,0) as rtpcrcount, nullif(oa.estcount,0) as estcount, nullif(oa.orthologcount, 0) as orthologcount, nullif(oa.gocount,0) as gocount, nullif(oa.tfbscount,0) as tfbscount, nullif(oa.proteomicscount,0) as proteomicscount, nullif(oa.communitycount,0) as communitycount, CASE oa.isOrganellar WHEN 0 THEN 'no' ELSE 'yes' END as isOrganellar_flag, CASE oa.arraygenecount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as array_flag, CASE oa.chipchipgenecount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as chipchip_flag, CASE oa.rnaseqcount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as rnaseq_flag, CASE oa.estcount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as est_flag, --CASE oa.snpcount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as snp_flag, CASE oa.ecnumbercount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as ec_flag, CASE oa.gocount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as go_flag, CASE oa.rtpcrcount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as rtpcr_flag, CASE oa.orthologcount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as ortholog_flag, CASE oa.communitycount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as community_flag, CASE oa.tfbscount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as tfbs_flag, CASE oa.hasHTSIsolate WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as hasHTSIsolate_flag, --CASE oa.hasPopset WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as hasPopset_flag, CASE oa.proteomicscount WHEN 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'yes' END as proteomics_flag, oa.is_annotated_genome FROM apidbtuning.organismAttributes oa

sqlQuery.name: GenomeAnnotationVersion
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT oa.source_id, oa.project_id, v.annotation_version, v.annotation_source FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oa.source_id, oa.project_id,dsh.annotation_version,dsh.annotation_source FROM ( SELECT max(dsh.build_number) bld, dsh.dataset_presenter_id FROM apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh WHERE dsh.annotation_version is not null GROUP BY dsh.dataset_presenter_id ) dpb , apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh , apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd , apidbtuning.organismattributes oa WHERE dpb.bld = dsh.BUILD_NUMBER AND dpb.dataset_presenter_id = dsh.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID AND dsh.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id AND dd.name like oa.internal_abbrev || '\_primary_genome%' escape '\' ) v ON oa.source_id = v.source_id AND oa.project_id = v.project_id

sqlQuery.name: GenomeVersion
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT oa.source_id, oa.project_id, v.genome_version,v.genome_source FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oa.source_id, oa.project_id,dsh.genome_version,dsh.genome_source FROM ( SELECT max(dsh.build_number) bld, dsh.dataset_presenter_id FROM apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh WHERE dsh.genome_version is not null GROUP BY dsh.dataset_presenter_id ) dpb , apidbtuning.datasethistory dsh, apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd , apidbtuning.organismattributes oa WHERE dpb.bld = dsh.BUILD_NUMBER AND dpb.dataset_presenter_id = dsh.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID AND dsh.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id AND dd.name like oa.internal_abbrev || '\_primary_genome%' escape '\' ) v ON oa.source_id = v.source_id AND oa.project_id = v.project_id

sqlQuery.name: BuscoGenomeCounts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, busco_genome, lineage_dataset as busco_lineage_dataset FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes o LEFT JOIN (WITH busco_data AS ( SELECT oa.source_id, sequence_type, lineage_dataset, to_char(c_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS c_per, to_char(s_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS s_per, to_char(d_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS d_per, to_char(f_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS f_per, to_char(m_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS m_per, ( c_score + f_score + m_score ) AS total FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidb.organism o, apidb.busco b WHERE b.organism_id = o.organism_id AND o.taxon_id = oa.component_taxon_id ) SELECT oa.source_id, lineage_dataset, 'C:' || b.c_per || '%[S:' || b.s_per || '%,D:' || b.d_per || '%],F:' || b.f_per || '%,M:' || b.m_per || '%,n:' || b.total AS busco_genome FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, busco_data b WHERE b.sequence_type = 'genome' AND b.source_id = oa.source_id ) busco ON o.source_id = busco.source_id

sqlQuery.name: BuscoProteinCounts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, busco_protein FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes o LEFT JOIN (WITH busco_data AS ( SELECT oa.source_id, sequence_type, to_char(c_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS c_per, to_char(s_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS s_per, to_char(d_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS d_per, to_char(f_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS f_per, to_char(m_score /(c_score + f_score + m_score) * 100, '990.9') AS m_per, ( c_score + f_score + m_score ) AS total FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidb.organism o, apidb.busco b WHERE b.organism_id = o.organism_id AND o.taxon_id = oa.component_taxon_id ) SELECT oa.source_id, 'C:' || b.c_per || '%[S:' || b.s_per || '%,D:' || b.d_per || '%],F:' || b.f_per || '%,M:' || b.m_per || '%,n:' || b.total AS busco_protein FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, busco_data b WHERE b.sequence_type = 'protein' AND b.source_id = oa.source_id ) busco ON o.source_id = busco.source_id

sqlQuery.name: IsPublished
sqlQuery.sql:
SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, CASE WHEN (dp.dataset_presenter_id in (SELECT dataset_presenter_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetpublication WHERE pmid IS NOT NULL ) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_published , '' || dp.display_name || '
' as dataset_page FROM APIDBTUNING.datasetdatasource dd, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dp WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id AND dd.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dd.dataset_presenter_id = dp.dataset_presenter_id

sqlQuery.name: ReleasePolicy
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id, o.project_id, p.release_policy FROM apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter p WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id AND dd.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dd.dataset_presenter_id = p.dataset_presenter_id

sqlQuery.name: BuildFirstLast
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT o.source_id,o.project_id, MIN(h.build_introduced) AS build_introduced, h.build_latest_update FROM apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, ( SELECT dataset_presenter_id, min(build_number) as build_introduced, max(build_number) as build_latest_update FROM apidbtuning.datasethistory GROUP BY dataset_presenter_id ) h WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id AND dd.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dd.dataset_presenter_id = h.dataset_presenter_id GROUP BY o.source_id, o.project_id, h.build_latest_update

SELECT o.source_id,o.project_id, MIN(h.build_introduced) AS build_introduced, h.build_latest_update FROM apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd, apidbtuning.organismattributes o, apidb.datasource ds, ( SELECT dataset_presenter_id, min(build_number) as build_introduced, max(build_number) as build_latest_update FROM apidbtuning.datasethistory GROUP BY dataset_presenter_id ) h WHERE o.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id AND dd.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dd.dataset_presenter_id = h.dataset_presenter_id AND ds.project_id = o.project_id GROUP BY o.source_id, o.project_id, h.build_latest_update

sqlQuery.name: IsApolloGenome
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT oa.source_id, oa.project_id, CASE WHEN (aid.apolloid IS NOT NULL) THEN 'Apollo' ELSE 'N/A' END AS is_in_apollo, CASE WHEN (aid.apolloid IS NOT NULL) THEN 'https://apollo.veupathdb.org/annotator/loadLink?organism='||aid.apolloid ELSE '@WEBAPP_BASE_URL@/static-content/faq.html#apollo10' END AS apolloidurl FROM apidbtuning.organismattributes oa LEFT JOIN apidbtuning.ApolloID aid ON oa.organism_name = aid.organism
